attributes.action: Save the foxes and stop building on there land
attributes.additional_details: Last night someone decided to hit a poor fox and drive off .. so me and my mum decided to help it it had blood dripping all out of its mouth suffering and that is not fair .. us a community are destroying there homes and there habitat and we need to stop they need to be protected !! Foxes are beautiful wonderful animals and we need to help them as a young girl my age I am absolutely traumatised and they need to be helped urgently
attributes.background: Stop allowing people to build on there land … and help foxes if they are hurt or damaged

rejection.details:
We're really sorry to hear about this distressing incident with a fox and we can tell you'd like the Government to do something about it. At the moment your petition doesn't put forward a clear enough ask from the Government. It's not clear what would qualify as foxes' land. 

You could start a petition asking the Government to require developers to do a full ecological survey of land before they're allowed to build on it. This might help the protection of foxes.

Or you could sign other petitions which are open and calling for changes which might help foxes, for example: 

Create an emergency Vet service to help injured animals.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598797
